Title: Reforged Purpose
Description: That's all of them! Now, it's time to do my duty and recast these tools. Reforge them, and myself, into what I was meant to be: a proud machinist of the Ringing Deeps.
ObjectivesText: Help Machinist Kittrin reforge and rededicate the tools.
CompletionText: I'm ready to do my part once again. I just need to reforge these old tools.
RewardText:
I can't thank you enough for all of your help. I lost my faith, but now, I have both my faith and my tools back.

I'm forever grateful to you.
